ygData.subject: Charm /pet who leader
ygData.msgSnippet: Just thought I would share a picture if anyone cares to see it.  It was during a GM run event.  First a bit of a disclaimer this is the first event that I ever
ygData.messageBody:
Just thought I would share a picture if anyone cares to see it. It was
during a GM run event. First a bit of a disclaimer this is the first event
that I ever went to that was not a kill the bad guy event. I had been to
many before this and when Mayong Mistmoore started running his mouth towards
a few people in the crowd (namely a lovely wood elf bard), I had just about
had enough of him. So I charmed his buddy and tried to sick it on him but
before I could sickhim someone dispelled him, oh well. I really would have
love to have off'd one of the more famous mobs in game. But instead I was
banished to Tox forest where I was yelled at. Ahh such is life.

Mu

I had to change the color on the picture because the ship wont let me send a
file that is too large.
